meanings.definition: The condition or status of being a villein.
meanings.sent1: In the past, many people lived in villenages and worked the land.
meanings.sent2: The villenages were often subject to the control of the lord of the manor.
meanings.sent3: The villenages in the village had their own unique charm.
meanings.sent4: She felt trapped in the villenages of her mundane life.
meanings.sent5: The word 'villenages' always reminds me of medieval times.
